titles.title: A bill to increase the number of non-dual status technicians employable by the National Guards.
A bill to increase the number of non-dual status technicians employable by the National Guards.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Increases (from 1,600 to 3,200) the limitation on the number of non-dual status technicians employed by the Army National Guard.
Increases (from 1,950 to 3,550) the permanent limitation on the total number of such personnel employed by the National Guard.
